thread.title: Allied Wallet Featured in Direct Selling News as Online Payment Processing Vendor
thread.title_full: Allied Wallet Featured in Direct Selling News as Online Payment Processing Vendor

author: admin
title: Allied Wallet Featured in Direct Selling News as Online Payment Processing Vendor
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 3:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Allied Wallet 
LOS ANGELES -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Allied Wallet, a leading provider of online payment processing and multi-currency merchant services serving over 125 million users globally, has been featured on Direct Selling News ' website and their print publication as a suggested vendor for online payment processing for direct selling and network marketing companies. 
Direct Selling News has been serving direct selling and network marketing executives since 2004, offering beneficial content for the direct selling industry. The publication and website features informative articles on the current issues and news within the industry. 
Allied Wallet is a featured vendor because of their unique ability to customize solutions for the direct selling industry. 
Allied Wallet services 196 countries around the world and has provided online payment processing solutions for countless direct selling, network marketing, and multi-level marketing companies. 
They have the ability to not only accept 164 currencies, but also settle directly into a merchant's bank account in their currency of choice. The direct selling industry thrives off features that enable simpler business procedures. 
With a new prepaid card solution for affiliate payouts and a mobile point-of-sale “Swipe” device around the corner, Allied Wallet will have an all-inclusive payment solution for direct selling businesses. 
“We've worked hard to secure payments globally and simplify business for our merchants. Everything we have is state-of-the-art and we're proud to be a suggested vendor of Direct Selling News ,” said CEO Andy Khawaja. 
Allied Wallet has been able to increase merchants' business by up to 30% with their proprietary chargeback and fraud protection paired with their international payment processing capabilities. 
Based on the adaptability of their payment solutions, it's clear why they are not only a suggested vendor of Direct Selling News , but also a preferred payment solution globally. 
Find Allied Wallet on: Facebook | Twitter | LinkedIn | Google+ 
About Allied Wallet: 
Allied Wallet continues to revolutionize the e-commerce industry by introducing new and innovative payment processing solutions for online merchants, enabling them to send and receive global payments. With PCI compliant merchant services for nearly any business size, Allied Wallet provides a state-of-the-art payment gateway to optimize online transactions. Please visit www.alliedwallet.com .
